__e: Col. Bishop, if I may say, is a very old and dear friend of mine.
Bishop, this is exactly why I didn't want to turn the car around.
Bishop, this is a chance for you to be whoever you want for one night. So, why don't you get crazy?
Now who the hell is peter bishop, And why are you looking for him?
No one wants to do it, except for Bishop, and he has to be at the funeral.
They're not after Bishop. They're after me.
I have watched Dr. bishop as long as you have, perhaps not as closely, but I think you're wrong.
Mr. Bishop, what's here for you?
It's apparent Miss Bishop wants him more than I do.
Come on, Bishop, you've barely been in your apartment a year.
Just because you've read some files about me, Mr. Bishop, doesn't mean you know the hell that I've been stuck in or what I have to do to make it stop.
Look, I'm pretty sure Bishop doesn't want to hear anything from me right now.
